info.description:
(During first three volumes)

Blake was always nervous about her special skill. She wasn't sure if it was a second semblance, but she did know she was ashamed of it.
Whenever Blake talks like an anime catgirl, people will do whatever she tells them. They won't even think it's weird. After how bad the last time she used that power turned out she swore she wouldn't use it again.
Or at least she wouldn't if her teammates weren't the sexiest trio of women ever! Between Yang's tits, Ruby's eyes and Weiss's everything how could Blake resist having some sexy fun?
